login_success_id_0001.description: [Login Page]-[Given:User Login service success'., When: Users follow these steps {1. Input 'Username/Password', 2.  Click 'Login' button}, Then: Should be login success]
expected_result_key: You logged into a secure area!

logout_success_id_0001.description: [Logout Page]-[Given:User Logout service success'., When: Users follow these steps {1. Navigate in Secure Page, 2.  Click 'Logout' button}, Then: Should be logout success]
expected_result_key: You logged out of the secure area!
